disclaimer_start: Disclaimer: The following architectural design is provided as a general conceptual representation and should not be taken as professional architectural advice. Always consult with certified professionals before implementing any construction plans.

rooms.description: Spacious entrance area with Scandinavian aesthetic minimalistic finishes, incorporating natural light through large windows.
Open-plan living space with comfortable seating and integrated indoor-outdoor connectivity to the rooftop terrace.
Functional Scandinavian kitchen with modern cabinetry, natural light, and Vastu aligned entrance from the main living area.
Adjacent to the kitchen for a seamless dining experience, with clean lines and ample space for family gatherings.
Guest bedroom designed with subtle Scandinavian touches and privacy features; Vastu principles considered in room orientation.
Compact utility area for laundry and storage, strategically placed near the kitchen.

openings.description: Main entrance door oriented in a Vastu compliant direction with a minimalist design.
Large window to maximize natural light and ensure adherence to Vastu principles of energy flow.
Window placement ensuring proper ventilation and alignment with the main living area.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an adjoining ensuite bathroom designed in a Scandinavian style, ensuring privacy and ample natural light.
Additional bedroom providing comfortable living space with attention to interior layout following Vastu guidelines.
Private bathroom for the master bedroom, designed with minimalistic aesthetics and efficient plumbing layout.
Connects upper floor to the rooftop terrace, offering a transitional space that maintains Scandinavian design cues.

openings.description: Strategically placed windows ensuring ventilation and adherence to Vastu principles on upper floors.
Access door leading from the upper floor to the expansive rooftop terrace designed for relaxation and outdoor living.

rooftop_terrace.description: Expansive Scandinavian-inspired rooftop terrace featuring open space with minimalistic design elements, incorporating natural stone and wood finishes. Vastu principles are adhered to by orienting the terrace for optimal sun exposure.

vastu_considerations.north_direction: Ensured in entrance hall and main living spaces to attract positive energy.
vastu_considerations.east_orientation: Kitchen windows and openings oriented towards the east to capture morning sunlight, promoting health and well-being.

disclaimer_end: Disclaimer: This JSON representation is a conceptual design outline. For actual construction plans, please consult with certified architects and local building authorities.
